title: MasterChef runner-up Callum Hann and wife Crystal welcome their first child together
text:
MasterChef runner-up Callum Hann and his wife Crystal have welcomed their first child together.

The overjoyed new parents announced the news on Instagram, under a series of beaming shots from the hospital.

Speaking to The Sunday Telegraph soon after the birth, Callum said: 'Crystal and I are excited to become parents.'

'We're enjoying every precious moment': MasterChef runner-up Callum Hann and his wife Crystal (both pictured) have welcomed their first child together which they shared to Instagram on Sunday

'Right now we are enjoying every precious moment. I'm a little biased, but I think she's pretty damn cute!'

The couple named their bundle of joy Elle Madeleine Hann.

Callum wore a blue a blue hospital shirt while holding in the newborn in one snap, with him beaming from ear to ear.

Another snap saw him and Crystal lovingly gaze over at their newborn, while sitting at a hospital bed together.

Sweet! 'Right now we are enjoying every precious moment. I'm a little biased, but I think she's pretty damn cute!' Callum told Confidential. Here holding daughter Elle Madeleine Hann

The couple made the announcement about the exciting family news in September, with them holding up a sonogram on Father's Day.

'Happy Father's Day to all the wonderful dads out there,' he wrote.

'I look back fondly on the memories I have with my dad, and look forward to becoming one soon.'

'I look back fondly on the memories I have with my dad, and look forward to becoming one soon': the couple shared a snap of themselves holding a sonogram on Father's Day

Following his appearance on the show, Callum took his knowledge and experience to launch his own cooking school in Adelaide.

In 2011, he launched Sprout Cooking with dietitian Themis Chryssidis.

He has cooked at The Press Club, Maha, Hellenic Republic, and PM24 and toured universities teaching students how to cook and eat well.

The young chef has also released three cookbooks over the past few years.
description: MasterChef runner-up Callum Hann and his wife Crystal have welcomed their first child together.
authors: Caleb Taylor For Daily Mail Australia
